column5: got an invite to hit simcoe from the guys ,, had the day off , why not? got set up at 9:00 and 10 minutes later ,, the early birds get their first fish.   steady action between 9:45 and noon iciing a couple [ misssed a few] tip-ups in the hut with spreaders  and mainly jigging outside with williams half and half.     finally at 2:30 , i come up solid on this beauty. nervous couple of minutes trying to get it steered headfirst to the hole . i was expecting a heavier laker ,, this fish took drag countless times ,,never gave up !! what a brute.     tuesdays catch , 4 whities , 1 lake trout.   another great day on simcoe ,,nice to be able to share this with you folks. hope the ice holds 'til the weekend.m
Some nices fishes! THanks for sharing
That is a brute! Awesome whitie my friend!  sounds like a good day out there   Ryan
Nice whitie man!  I can't wait for this day to be over 4 days in a row of hitting simcoe for me!
Great report and pics waterwolf  That whitie is a real brute     Congratulations Looks like a ton of fun.... good job you guys and thanks for sharing Leechman
Those are some fine looking whities. I'm drooling just thinking of what I would do to them in the kitchen
thanks guys ,, it was a good day alround.  great to get out with these jokers on hard water ,,  everyone's so busy come summer . you know how it goes.  be safe.
looks like a great day doesnt look like there were any mishaps some good lookin fish and nice whitie i must say good on ya for gettin out  Matt!
nice whiteys man looks like good day
That one whitie is huge!  Nice going.
Thats a nice big whitie! Did you measure him?  -R-
